Service Details: - Works with UBC's Okanagan campus community to eliminate structural and attitudinal barriers allowing students to overcome disability-related challenges that impede their academic success- Provides disability-related services and academic accommodations to students, staff and faculty with documented disabilities- Provides services to students in keeping with the University’s policy on Academic Policy for Students with Disabilities (Policy 73)- Assists students by offering programs and advocacy services to foster an accessible and welcoming campus
Eligibility: UBC Okanagan students, staff and faculty
Address & Map: University Centre3272 University Way, UNC214Kelowna, BC     V1V 1V7View MapQuest Map
